Aliases and functions: $mod+Shift+q: Forcefully kill a window (use with caution).
convert ~/Downloads/file.jpeg maths: convierte/inserta/da el codigo para Hugo
gitpush: send to git and ask for the message for the commit
Window Management: $mod+f: Toggle fullscreen mode for the focused window.
$mod+Shift+space: Toggle floating mode for the focused window.
$mod+e: Toggle between split and tabbed/stacking layout.
$mod+r: Enter resize mode (use j, k, l, ; to resize).
Workspace Management: $mod+Shift+number: Move the focused window to workspace number.
$mod+Shift+Left/Right: Move the focused window to the adjacent workspace.
$mod+Ctrl+Left/Right: Move to the next or previous workspace.
Pacman Cheatsheet: sudo pacman -Syu: Update and upgrade all packages.
sudo pacman -S package_name: Install a package.
sudo pacman -Rs package_name: Remove a package and its dependencies not required by any other installed package.
sudo pacman -Ss keyword: Search for packages.
sudo pacman -Qi package_name: Display information about an installed package.
Errors Pacman: pacman -Sy archlinux-keyring --noconfirm : Ensure that the system's keyring is up-to-date
Yay Cheatsheet: yay: Upgrade all packages (AUR and repository).
yay -S package_name: Install a package from the AUR or repositories.
yay -Rs package_name: Remove a package and its dependencies.
yay -Ss keyword: Search for packages in the AUR and repositories.
yay -Qi package_name: Display information about an installed package.
AUR: cd my_new_package # And we move to its directory.
Pass Cheatsheet: pass insert site/username: Insert a new password.
pass generate site/username [length]: Generate a new password of specified length.
pass site/pass otp site: Show the password for a site.
pass rm site/username: Remove a password entry.
pass edit site/username: Edit a password entry.
Various: python greeting.py : launch a Python file
git add . # Stage all changes in the working directory for the next commit.
Useful Linux orders: du -hc ./example1 or du -hc: Show Only total Disk Usage of a Directory in n human-readable format.
